PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
 MODULE STATUS_0100.																																
 MODULE GET_DATA.

   MODULE MODIFY_SCREEN.

*																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
  LOOP AT GT_ITEM.																																
    FIELD GS_ITEM-L_CHECK MODULE HANDLE_CLICK ON INPUT.																																
    FIELD GS_ITEM-GR_NOW MODULE CHECK_GR_NOW ON INPUT.
